USD.comment_0: The fudge factor of 1.03 makes it 3% cheaper to use this asset for fees
USD.comment_1: i.e. the node will overvalue it compared to other assets,
USD.comment_2: and the user can thus pay fees with an according discount.
USD.comment_3: Do disfavor a fee asset and provide cover for its volatility,
USD.comment_4: you could instead use a fudge factor of 0.97 to put a 3% premium on its use.
